Reviews.Title: worthless
Reviews.Author: marine1
Reviews.Content: This camera is not worth the price i paid for it.It"s about one and one half by one and one half.It has no slot for the card.The usb cable is too big.If i had known this i would not had purchashed it.It"s not worth but about $5.00.

Reviews.Title: It is OK for my son's first camera but the quality of pictures seems poor.
Reviews.Author: Heather Cogar
Reviews.Content: The quality of pictures seems poor. The pictures seem grainy. I was hoping for a little bit more crisper picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: Pamela Buckley
Reviews.Content: Sorry but this item was a dud right out of the box.  It just did not work so I returned it.  No problem doing that whatsoever.

ProductInfo.Features:
The 1.1 inch previews screen allows you to view your photos instantly and preview your photos on the go
Shoot photos, video clips and use as a PC-web cam.
Shoot video clips
Simply connect the camera to your computer using the included USB cable, download, and edit photos to share them.
Use the 3-in-1 features to broadcast your party to friends, chat on-line with video, or turn photos into stop-motion animation.
ProductInfo.Name: Digital Camera
